name: Escape the Basement
description:
A short escape room experience. See if you can beat it within 15 minutes! 

Try the game for free, and feel free to support for future escape rooms!

This game is for Oculus Quest and Quest 2 only at the moment. 

Controls:

Walk: Left Thumb Stick

Snap Rotate: Right Thumb Stick

Grab Objects: Grib Button
